div.div: St. Norbert College vs. Lawrence Univ.

tr.td: SNC wins toss and defers. LU to receive and defend south end zone.
Randy Hill kickoff 62 yards to the LU3, Trevor Spina return 20 yards to the LU23 (Dan Egan).
Isa.Barthelmess rush for 5 yards to the LU28 (Joe Schlueter).
Isa.Barthelmess rush for no gain to the LU28 (Max Pirman).
LukeBarthelmess rush for 14 yards to the LU42, 1ST DOWN LU, out-of-bounds.
LukeBarthelmess pass complete to Isa.Barthelmess for loss of 5 yards to the LU37 (Joe Schlueter).
LukeBarthelmess rush for loss of 1 yard to the LU36 (Brian Feltz).
LukeBarthelmess punt 38 yards to the SNC26, Matt Fargo return 4 yards to the SNC30 (Dan Dubnicka).
